content: **knitted neck-warmer for men in drops big merino the piece is worked with rib texture and saddle shoulders ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern mb-068 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl - xxl/xxxl height 25-26-27 cm **yarn** drops big merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150-200 g colour 02 grey **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need an 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
